description: An use-full Alexa Skill which uses Google Translate to translate list of spices in World to different language such as Spanish,Italian,German,Polish,French,English.More language support will  be updated soon.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask spice translate to translate basil to spanish
Alexa launch spice translate and get translation for bay leaves in italian
Alexa ask spice translate what is basil in german
name: Spice Translate
shortDescription: An use-full Alexa Skill which uses Google Translate to translate list of Spices in World to different language.
